function.description: Returns the index at which `needle` occurs in `haystack` for the last time.

parameterDescriptions.parameterDescription: The string that will be searched.
The string that will be searched for in `haystack`.

function.longDescription: Returns -1 if the index could not be found. If an empty needle is provided, the length of the haystack will be returned.

example.title: Usage
example.code:
use System, String;
System.print(String.lastIndexOf("ABBA", "A")); // Result: 3 System.print(String.lastIndexOf("ABBA", "")); // Result: 4 System.print(String.lastIndexOf("ABBA", "C")); // Result: -1 System.print(String.lastIndexOf("document.doc", "doc")); // Result: 9
